content.detailedDescription:
���last week, a ufo enthusiast asked me if i had ever seen a ufo.  i answered that i "might" have seen one between 1973 and 1976, but wasn't sure.  it was not something that my traveling partner and i recognized.  we were both ph.D. dupont chemists coming home from a business trip,  as we drove home south on route 1 from the philadelphia airport after a rainstorm about 5:00 to 6:00 p.M. we saw a red orb in the clouds slowly moving from east to west.  we actually could not see the object, only its glow in the clouds.  lots of airplanes were in the sky and, since we lived in the area, we were used to seeing these, but the red orb was definitely different.  we followed it for about 15-20 minutes continually discussing what it might be.  at that point, we arrived home and the orb continued traveling from delaware into maryland.  obviously, it was moving very slowly and never picked up speed.  in response to my e-mail about this incident, my friend sent me the current report of red orbs observed in pennsylvania on november 5, 2011.  it sounds like the same thing we saw!���

this report submitted at the request of roger marsh.
content.summary: Red glow in rain clouds from an orb

content.detailedDescription:
It was the night of christmas eve/christmas morning at approximately 12:50 am, and my husband and i were out on the porch watching the sky, since we had seen a cigar/rod shaped craft three days prior, and all of the sudden, i spotted an object that looked "v" shaped, with no actual lights that i could see, but again (like the last sighting) looked hazy and cloud-like (but a definite structure), and was following the same path as the last object we saw!!  it looked huge..3 inches across from side to side, when measured with fingers, and again, completely silent. it was moving pretty fast, so the sighting didn't last long, and again wasn't able to get any pictures or video.  since this is our second sighting within 3 days, i'm wondering if we are in a flight path of some kind?!  i also wanted to make a correction from my last report..I said the object was seen between jupiter and orion, but i have come to learn what we were looking at was not jupiter, since jupiter is to the right of orion, and this was seen to the left of orion from our view.  i'm a tad bit freaked, but i am watching now every night!! 


i would like to request ken pfeiffer as my field investigator, since i had spoken to him last week about the first sighting, if possible.  thank you for your time.
content.summary: "v" shaped craft seen in hillsborough, nj, 2nd sighting in 3 days!!

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving from the 67 to san vicente rd at 10:30pm
2. noticed lights at 67/dye rd intersection. 
3.  at first i believed them to be a plane, but as i drove closer i realized that the lights were circling.
4. object was triangular with one red and one green light in the rear and one white light/spotlight in the front. it circled over a farming area multiple times while i was driving through the area. the object was completely silent and after i stopped my car to watch it further, as it passed above me it shone its spotlight at my car.
5. i felt very scared and called my boyfriend and had him talk to me while parked and as i was driving home. he recorded our phone conversation as i was describing what i saw.
6. i was frightened after the light shone into my car and drove away while on the phone. i looked in my rearview mirrors but could no longer see the object.

attachments:

- map of area including points labeled 1, 2, and 3. red circles indicate approximate flight path.
- drawing of what i saw at point 2 on map. this is when the object was closest to me and i could make out the triangular shape nearly directly above me.
- drawing of what i saw at point 3 on map. this is when the object shone its light at my car. the light was directed at my car and then moved past it as the object passed over me.
content.summary: Ufo circled and shone spotlight on my parked car when overhead

content.detailedDescription:
i read an article on the internet about "strange lights over carson california" and have seen something like what was reported.  i live in carson near wilmington near 220th street.  i lived in carson for 11 years now and just recently (the last 2 years) i have had a couple of ufo sightings in carson.  one time a 1 1/2 years ago while pumping gas at arco across from the sheriff station i saw a red glowing pulsating object  high in the sky.  it looked like a sighting i saw in culver city in the early 80's, it was a bright white object that moved like a fire fly high in the night sky.  but what concerns me is the recent sightings, which seems to be too close to home.  at night (actually morning) about 1am - 5:30am (off and on) there is a strange light that (which source has to be coming from the north) only eliminating in a certain section of my bedroom. what is really eerie, it makes my ceiling fan glow a faint light.  when i started looking for the light source i saw this brilliant light in the sky through my window (that resembled 2 car head in the sky) between 2 roof tops.  the next day i started to look for possible light source (e.G. street lights, neighborhood light, and power lines) but i could not find a legitimate light source.  

this has been happening intermittently throughout the month.  so this morning (12/26/2011 at 5am) when i saw this strange light shining on my wall i grabbed my cell phone and recorded the event about 3 times.  then i found my cannon camera and recorded better video footage.  so all together i recorded the event 6 times.  to make sure i wasn't dreaming i woke up my daughter and she looked out my window and she saw the same thing. 
 
note: i did what i could to record this event, but the footage is not the best quality because i was recording inferior equipment (i.E., lg cell phone, and cannon digital camera), plus i recorded the event through my bedroom window which is dirty with finger prints, plus i was trying to record through some aluminum blinds, so there was a lot of jerky movement.  i would have gone outside in backyard, but quite frankly i was scared.  

i would like to talk to someone about this before this is published (if it is published) to the public
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light that look like car head lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: You have my story ,case #33344. go onto piaco 3 on facebook under my name.You have to blow pics to at less 150 times.There are now 4 differant objects. .They are 3 seperate areas and times. some needs to find out to blow my pics 116 to 341.Tonite clouds and the only thing out is one of things.It lights up the clouds.When it lights flash it mrofes into diff.Shape.I see other things smaller than it fly into it and not fly out.I have been taking pics of this objects for 4 mos.Its a solid object with 3rows of lights with red blue green some flash and some dont.Let me know if you cant blow up pics.Thanks
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cigar,   Disc,   Flash,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Case #33344

content.detailedDescription:
It was christmas eve, me and my family were outside smoking in the cold. i seen that my neighbors were outside as well. they walked over with their 3 young kids and asked if we were outside looking at what was in the sky. we didn't know until they came over to show us two bright orange red objects in the sky flying next to each other, then stopping. i took my iphone out to record them and bought a good 25 sec of them before going inside to get the rest of my family to show them so they didn't think me and my cousins were crazy. my neighbor had told me that their were a lot of people pulled over on the main road near my house looking at these objects. they then disappeared, until a half hour later another one came along doing the same thing, flying and stopping, flying and stopping. very strange, and i am one not to fall for ufo stories or what not. i uploaded my video to youtube, and submitted it to many blogs and sites so i can get more of an understanding from people who study this stuff.  i would love to hear your input on this.

here's the video, i don't have it available to upload, here's the youtube link [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]]

i would love for you guys to post it to get some feedback from people, and maybe someone else in my area seen this as well.

thanks again,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: 2 bright lights flying and stopping before disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? 
cascade township park. myself and several close friends were participating in a outdoor nerf gun war-game called zomb, wherein 80-150+ people engage in a "zombie apocalypse" survival game. 

2. what made you first notice the object?
our "squad" was moving along the perimeter of the park closest to i-96. my friend jason was the first to notice the lights and point them out. we looked ne across the park to see 8 orange glowing ufos paired off in a staggered formation about 30-40 degrees above the horizon. as we looked across the highway at the gerald ford international airport we saw searchlights moving across the sky over the airport.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
my first impression based on the pulsating glow of the objects was that of aerial flares. however the night was breezy and if the objects had indeed been flares they would have been drifting in the wind. 

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
the 8 objects remained stationary, paired off at equal distance from each other in their staggered formation. no downward fall or drift with the wind currents. the objects were completely silent. (i don't know who else in the park that night may have noticed the phenomenon although it was clearly visible for at least 5 minutes.)

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
i was the most excited, i kept asking everyone around me "are you seeing this? tell me you're seeing this." the sighting was verified by the 5 other people that made up our small 'squad' which included several of my closest friends. i was frustrated because i had brought a camera to the event but had left it locked in my car for fear of it being lost or damaged during the course of the game. (the image included is a approximation of the event superimposed on a screenshot from the google road cam.)

6.How did you lose sight of the object?
the objects disappeared one by one over the course of 45 seconds to a minute, i personally witnessed at least two of the objects disappear as we continued moving along the perimeter of the park. by the time we came to a halt, the objects had all vanished.
content.summary: Formation of 8 paired, glowing orange lights, steady but pulsating slightly

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 13, 2010 at about 9pm, my companion and i were sitting on the beach in destin, fl just behind pompano joe's restaurant on old hwy 98.  we were taking in the waves and watching the stars.  my attention was focused on one 'star' that was moving.  we had just watched the launch of space shuttle atlantis from cape kennedy earlier that day and having seen the iss, satellites, etc. move overhead in the past, it appeared to be about the same size and speed.  i thought this may be the shuttle going overhead - until i realized it was traveling from south to north...Definitely not a typical satellite orbit from west to east.  as we continued watching for about 5-10 minutes, it was directly overhead when it stopped - dead stopped.  no sounds were heard except a slight breeze and the waves.  my companion and i looked at each other and exclaimed to each other, "no way".  we stayed on the beach another 45 minutes but the object did not move, change brilliance, or anything else noticeable.  we had nothing to visually record this event so we gave up craning our necks to watch.  there were no other observers around to discuss this with.  being a physicist all my life, i always had reservations about such sightings, etc. until that night.

I was driving home when i noticed this flashinglight, then i noticed it wasn't moving like the rest of the planes in the sky.So i continued to watch it, it moved slowly back and fourth and stayed in the sky til wee hours of the morning. i've seen this object 5 times sense october always in the east south east sky close to atlanta.
content.summary: Flashing many colors comes every week

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a bright light in the southern sky well below the moon with my naked eye, it was near detroit metro airport, i could see a few airplanes passing and this looked nothing like that, so not having a telescope or camera besides my i phone i grabbed my binoculars and could see bright radiant colors eminating in a flame like formation with mostly bright colors of red, green and blue appendage like shapes,from what i originally thought could be a star but seemed awful close and low and besides it was a cloudy night sky, i could only see the moon although not fully dark out yet, it was there for 45 min's that i noticed and it became much darker towards the end, i would guess it to not be real far being my binoculars are standard type not super powerful so i am curious if anyone else reports this
content.summary: Close to dtw airport watched thru binoculars southern sky, below moon eminated radiant colors of blue, red and green in a somewhat flame formation noticed for 45 mins then got smaller and then unnoticable

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from our home into the local town on christmas eve.  it was approximatly 9:50 p.M.  we saw high in the sky approximatly 6 or 7 round reddish - orange blobs.  they were not flying slow and they were not flying fast, sort of a medium pace.  they did not make any sound and were evenly spaced apart.  we watched them at they flew out of our site.  many people saw these and we joked that it was santa and his raindeer.
content.summary: Silent glowing orange blobs, flying in a straight line all evenly spaced.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a municipal bus with my brother and saw that something was moving slowly in a high-activity aircraft and saw that it was a plane because it was still and then moved quickly grabbed a cell phone and recorded by tors time because we did not have a cell phone in hand, but when you were recording the object is stand still and suddenly it was not able to capture well as the bus was moving a lot and when i went to look at the object was gone but in the video it shows the fine l as the object is removed rapidly from the place.
content.summary: With great speed

content.detailedDescription: At midnight on christmas, 12/25/2011, my son and i decided to take our dog for a walk. we were walking south in the 13000 block of roe in leawood, ks. when we spotted two amber/orange lights approaching approx 30 degrees in the sky, as if they were from an aircraft. we thought the color was odd for an approaching aircraft. the lights were fairly close together and horizontal from one another. they then grew a little further apart and then became vertical in their positioning with one another, as if the craft was in a 90 degree banking position. we thought that wasn't possible if it was an aircraft. the lights then moved next to one another and stopped and hovered for about 15 seconds. at this point they were about 30 degrees off the horizon and made no sound. it was eerily quiet. we were stopped in our tracks in awe wondering what in the world we were experiencing!! it was definately not an airplane! initially we thought it was one craft with two lights, but now we believe the lights are on two separate craft. at this time of night there is no traffic on the street at all. all of a sudden the lead light starts to fade and appears to change direction to the south so the light disappears. seconds later the second light does the same. just at that moment one car (the only car we saw that night) headed south on roe stops and the two occupants asked if we just saw what they saw. they were excited like us and we talked for approx 30 seconds. they couldn't believe what they saw as well and had no explanation for the sighting. we all thought that what we saw was crazy, unbelievable and incredible!! i contacted the local fox affiliate the next morning and they advised me that there were no other reports of sightings on christmas night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two amber/orange lights moving towards us.

content.detailedDescription: I was across from our local  coffee shop when i heard this rumble above me, similar to the sound of a harley idiling. when i looked up i seen what was an all white medium size plane,flying low in the sky. the only way to describe it, is like a harley fat boy. it was all white and had 3 thick black lines on its underbelly, fat wings , came out from the side of the plane with its wing tips up, but not too high. their were no visible call numbers or writing of any kind on it. a fellow walking towards me heard the sound thru his head phones and stopped to see where it was coming from. we both watched it for about 2 minutes. by the time i took out my binoculars to get a better look it was gone, poof sound and all. how can something flying that low and loud, suddenly disappear, sound and all. we waited 5 minutes for it to reappear out of the low cloud cover but it never did. i walked thru the park watching the sky for another 15 minutes but it never returned. i can see loosing it in the cloud cover but how could such a rumble and a whole plane disappear like that.  back to the harley point again , when they are touring down the street we can sometimes hear them for blocks, but this sound was gone immediatly as was the low flying plane. the gentleman with me stood there waiting with me, and left scratching his head when it disappeared. any ideas folks?
content.summary: Don't really know what to call it, but it looked like a plane, that disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Every spring my brother and i and our cousin go to my brothers cabin in northern michigan to install his docks at his lakehouse cabin. every fall we take them out due to the lake freezing. after working to install the docks and shorestation (2.5 hours) we walked up to his deck\porch and relaxed on the patio laying in deck chairs that reclined back. this was around noon and after about ten minutes of catching our breath and getting hydrated my cousin had said, "that satellite hasnt moved in 5 minutes". it took us a couple of minutes to locate what he was looking at and determined this was either too big or too low to be a satellite. after grabbing my nephews telescopes inside the cabin we struggled to get the object in view due to low qulity telescope and for every mm we turned to dcope we seemed to moves miles in the wrong direction in the sky. about the time we were taking turns trying to get this object in the telescope three military fighter jets came from three different directions over the forest we were nestled in, we didnt even hear them until they had passed and our chests shook from the vibrations from the jets, that how fast they were flying. the only known air force base in the area closed almost 20 years ago.The jets each took a turn moving closer to the stationary object we had been trying to get a closer look at for 20 minutes and each jet would get about the same distance away and the free fall and fly in the opposite direction never to be seen again. the stationary object remained. then about 5 minutes later my cousin had had yelled to me to come quick to where was standing and said i just missed it. missed what i said, he said he doesnt know how to explain what he saw, then all of a sudden 2 balls of light rose from the tree line behind the cabin, moved like they were biological and moving in no pattern but left to right up and down arcing and weaving, this happened for only 6 or 7 seconds before the pulsated three times going from silver to orange to amber back and forth then skyrocketed across the lake at about 100' in the air and left some sort of vapor trail that lasted for about 1.5 seconds. i checked local papers and nobody else reported seeing this. i must state that the three of us never saw anything like this before, never believed in this before and rarely talk about this today. we are all family men with responsible jobs and have drug use or any reason to make this up. my brother wont even talk to me about what we saw because he deals with mathematical science and cant grasp what we saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Main large staionaty object in the sky then followed by lower moving objects

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside in the evening, something drew attention.  not easily seen but once spotted knew it was ufo.  its shape was like an egg when dropped in a pan, not exactly sphere shaped. huge, as large as a city block. jet plane flew in front of and seemed like a spec in comparison.  40 jets could have fit the size of this craft.  ufo hovered, witnessed for 5 minutes. had a feeling like "there is something going on here.  i don't know what, but sense is a big deal".
content.summary: Not easily viewed, large as a city block, shape like sphere / egg when dropped in pan

content.detailedDescription:
I don't normally go out looking for ufo's but tonight i had a premonition to go look at the stars. i had an experience in the same area on december 16th with red and white pulsating lights and i hoped to see those again, to determine what they might be. i took a drive out into the country. we live in a semi-rural area and i drove to a much more rural area where the stars are quite plentiful. i drove out into the country, taking back country roads, taking note of stars and the constellations as best i could. i started heading back on cth tc, going due west and i saw two light stars just above the horizon, about 45 degrees. 

my attention was diverted to driving for a moment and then looked at those stars again. i saw three stars this time, and all three of them made a perfect triangle. they were very bright, with the bottom "star" being the brightest of the three. it was so odd because i kept thinking, "there were only two stars there a moment ago and now there are three." i looked to see whether the stars were blinking or flashing like planes in the sky, but there was no flashing, only a solid bright white light. just when i was getting used to the bright triangle shape in the sky (about 5 seconds, perhaps), the bottom most "star," the one that hadn't been there moments before, began to move in an arch between the two other stars above it, and it moved in a southeasterly direction. i could see the other two stars get lighter in intensity and the bright star which was moving began to fade a bit as it moved across the sky. as it came approximately directly over my vehicle (and hence, i couldn't see it anymore), it faded from view.

i tried to tell myself it was a satellite or a plane, but it just didn't look like that. it looked like a star that moved. a bright star that moved, and it made the two stars near it bright, until it passed by. i can't explain that. i watched those two stars for quite some time afterwards and they didn't seem to do anything different than twinkle normally. this was no shooting star and i could see no evidence of anything else moving (like a satellite would) after it faded out. 

something strange i did notice was there were a lot of planes that seemed to fly directly "between" those two stars, including one that made a triangle with them. these planes had flashing lights that looked like regular aircraft. perhaps that was a normal flight path but it just seemed so odd to see three or four planes fly between those two stars like that.

there was a sliver of a moon and i identified venus in the sw horizon and jupiter above me. this was not a planet but a moving "star."
content.summary: Watched as a starlike object made triangle with other stars, then arched away

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:30 to 8:40 p.M. on dec. 25, 2011, i was standing and looking out at the sky from my ground floor apartment patio, talking on the phone. i saw a light grey, roundish, filmy substance moving toward me from the southeast, traveling northwesterly. the substance appeared to be unsolid - possibly gaseous. i had absolutely no idea what it could be as i had never seen anything like that before in my life. it grew larger as it approached and then took the shape of a craft. it was an oblong, six-sided craft with rounded ends. i saw a dull light grey and metallic-looking craft - my husband saw gray and black. it moved slowly, perhaps no more than 20 mph and no less than 10 mph. it moved very smoothly and as it continued to approach i noticed two appendages protruding from the closest end to me. they appeared to be something like very long antenas pointed downward. i was describing what i saw to the person i was talking to on the phone. then i yelled for my husband to come out and he saw it as well. the craft moved steadily and was completely silent. there were no exterior lights. the end farthest from me had windows and they seemed to contain one small golden light in each window. i think there were 4-6 windows. the craft flew over the parking lot and was approximately 300-500 ft. in altitude and approximately 300 ft. away from me at the closest point. it was hard to tell how high it was or how far away but it was very, very close. my husband said he wished he would have had a flashlight to shine on it because it probably would have reflected. my husband saw geometric shapes on the outside bottom of the craft. this was not writing, but black, wide lines that appeared to be more for functionality. 
my husband ran into the apartment and out the front door and out through the back parking lot to watch it. i went out the front door straight to the west. the craft soon went back to the original shape of a roundish, unsolid object. i saw the craft for about 30 seconds - my husband saw it for about 10 seconds. 

during and after the sighting i felt very peaceful and loving. during the sighting i was also very excited and all i could say was, "oh my god!", over and over again. this sighting was in chandler, az.
content.summary: Unknown craft appeared and flew over us.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were observing the night sky through our telescope. we were about to go inside and eat dinner and wrapped up the scope. before we went in, we were looking at stars above us,searching for polaris. as we were looking we seen a very bright star. but this star started to move in a north direction. it was steady bright just like a star and it was not a plane. it was very very high.It traveled in a north direction for about 15 - 20 seconds then seemed to fade and then in a milisecond it turned and headed back in the same direction. bright, steady and for about 10 - 15 seconds. then turned again, on a dime, flew back again on its original path north,then faded behind the trees in my yard.
   then several minutes after that, as we were trying to deduce what we just witnessed, my daughter looks directly above us and there appeared to be the same object traveling now to the east for about 20 seconds until we could not see it any more.
  we were blown away because we know what planes, choppers and other common aircraft look like. we of coarse tried to bebunk it so that we were not tricking ourselves. if i were to describe it in my own words, it looked like a very bright star packed his bags, got up out of his space and decided to go fly, forgot something and turned around ( not in a circle mind you ) 
came back to get whatever he forgot, got it and then turned again the same as before and left town ! we were not drinking, smoking or anything of that nature. just a dad and his pal, looking at the universe !
content.summary: Bright star like light traveled north faded then turned instantly,returned then turned again north

content.detailedDescription: On dec26 at about 11 pm me and my girl friend  and a friend went to  up to mount soledad, which is in la jolla ca, we brought my telescope up there and pointed it to the north east direction where there is a mountain range approx,  15 miles north east of mount soledad. this mountain is believe part of poway/romona but i'm not sure exactly what the mountain is called. in the middle of this mountain is  a canyon space that you can see right through and in this canyon area approx 100 ft about the canyon there are a row of light that point at a angle up above the mountain tops but it starts in this canyon. these lights are glowing orange and will change there glow from being very dim to all of a sudden  very bright in a perfect row, when i look in my telescope i can see many more glowing lights circling each other and making triangular patterns. these lights have been there multiple nights. i have seen them twice with my telescope which is a meade 4501. these lights seem to turn off and on at all different times, sometimes only 4 with be bright then only one then all 4 but what is weird is that they will have little glowing balls spinning around the original 4, these are not planes i have lived in san diego my whole life and i actually live in the flight path, where i'm looking it is approx 15 miles north of the flight path like i said these lights have been there for multiple nights so i def think we have a chance to investigate
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights glowing over a mountain, that change intensity and number of light, they multiply

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work with my sister. it takes us an hour to get home. i don't remember exactly where we were when i saw it. it was so fast that my sister didn't see it. it looked very large and it was like it came from behind us and directly above us and i saw it in my site above us for about 2 seconds. it is hard to describe but i was driving.
content.summary: I saw a silvery type of disc in the sky. very large. very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going from my garage to my house when i looked up like i always do
when i spotted an object going across the sky.It reminded me of when i was younger and would watch russia's sputnick cross the sky.What got my
attention was it was really traveling then changed direction.It made a 90
degree turn and sped off across the sky to the west then dissappeared.I 
just stood there looking up seeing nothing more than stars.This was a very
clear night with no lights aroung.I live in a rual area and always watch 
the stars when i can.
content.summary: Ufo?

content.detailedDescription: Five of us family members went outside for a smoke during our christmas day dinner when one of us noticed what only can be desribed as a spherical candle flame moving silently across the sky. it was maybe the size of a car?, and close but moving slowly and no light change. it hovered briefly then continued. we saw it from a couple different angles as it moved and my son and nephew who are in their 20's said it looked like a mini hot air balloon, but we all concurred that was not the case as it moved in a straight line except for the occassional hovering. after it stopped and hovered for a second time it went in a 90* turn from a hover-stop and that's when we all looked at each other and really knew that was a ufo! i personally have had other encounters, but 2 of the others were totally non-believers of anything out of the ordinary and they were blown away by this. after it took off then it was gone and we went inside.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: There were 5 other family member witnesses. looked like a very large candle flame in a sphere, no sound slowly moving across the lower sky.

content.detailedDescription:
For just over a week now ufo's have been "loitering" near my home.

they are here from the time that night falls until dawn. i usually go out and begin observing them at about 8pm.

i first noticed them the night of 19 dec. 2011. i was standing outside staring at the night sky in central florida from my home in the villages at somewhere between 01:00am and 03:00am when i noticed that one of the stars i was looking at was unusually bright. to my surprise as i was looking at it, it began to "wiggle".

over the nest minute or so the wiggling became movement back and forth on the horizontal axis. this object was about a 45 degree angle from me on the horizon and i could see that it was not only going back and forth in place but it was occasionally making small spirals in place as well.

i looked around at stars in the local area to make sure i wasn't imagining movement and the other stars in the area were static (not moving).

i ran inside and got my friend and asked him to watch this "star" for a minute and tell me what he saw just to be entirely sure that i was not imagining the movement and as we watched it began to move back and forth and in zig-zag patterns. my friend confirmed for me that i was not imagining the movement.

we have been observing them every night since (as i said they are there from dusk until dawn).

3-4 nights ago my friend and i woke up his mother at about 03:00am to observe the objects we had been telling her about (and she was quite amazed by the "moving stars" but what we all saw next was even more amazing) and while we were observing the objects (approx. 03:15am) i noticed a light blink into existence on the horizon. we watched as a small metallic clam-shaped object (we could only compare it to the craft from "flight of the navigator") approximately 4-6 feet in length and approximately 1-2 feet high (like a sideways teardrop or clam-shell) flew down to just above the rooftops in our neighborhood approximately 200 feet away from us right down the street.

the object hovered in place in clear view with street lights illuminating and reflecting off of it then it flew behind some rooftops and was gone.

we assumed because of it's size that it was an unmanned probe of some type.

a few nights ago my friend and i both saw one "dancing" in and out of the clouds making short, erratic bursts of movement and we are pretty sure we saw bursts of light that were straight lines of light (like a white laser) which flashed very quickly being emitted from the craft. we assumed they might have been sending communications to another craft in the area.

the night before last i saw seven scattered about the sky (i am an amateur astronomer but i will try to describe their locations the best i can). they were each a large distance away from each other, they are always unnaturally bright, brighter than the brightest stars in the sky. they look like someone has a flashlight at a very far distance away in pitch black and all you can see is a white dot moving in unnatural ways. some strobe, some are solid white.

now again, i am an amateur astronomer but we have been seeing them in the area of orion's belt, the dippers, ursus major, and other places i don't know the names of but i can walk out on any given night and point out where they are/will be.

movement: movements i have seen over the past week are fast movement in short bursts in one direction then immediately reversing direction, effectively wiggling back and forth, not very fast, but fast. i have seen them make small spirals on their horizontal axis. i have seen clouds moving east to west and the objects fly behind the clouds then come back out of the front of the clouds (showing that they move towards the cloud ((west to east)) and then reverse direction to come back out of the clouds traveling in the same direction as the clouds ((east to west))).

these craft have the ability to make these movements at will and can perform them going from a stationary hover and can immediately resume their stationary hover after performing these acts.

i am ex u.S. navy and a fan of flight and aircraft and i can say with certainty that these craft are not weather balloons, they are not helicopters, they are either in low orbit or just inside the mesosphere or stratosphere (i favor the belief that they are in the upper stratosphere) and they are not any publicly known aircraft, military or civilian.

i do not have a quality hd night-shot set-up but i am currently seeking some quality equipment to capture what i can.

i have a couple of really bad videos of them, but they are amateur with no tripod set-up and no night-vision. so essentially all i have is a poorly stabilized video of a light in pitch black, but i'm willing to share it with anyone who would like to see it.

if you live in central florida, please keep your eyes open for these craft, they are there and not hard to find if you know what you're looking. i would love to see what someone captures on a stabilized set-up with telescopic lenses.

thank you for reading my story and i thank anyone in advance who can help figure out what these craft are.

attached videos are short and entirely unedited. they were shot on two separate nights. they are poorly stabilized but note the lack of stars in the sky the only light you can see is the craft.

i apologize for the pitch black at the beginning of the second video, it took me a minute to find the craft with the camera and i wanted to keep both videos in their entirely unedited state (i didn't even change the file names after transferring from camera).

these videos were both shot with a kodak m530 (12 mp - 3x max optical zoom).

enjoy!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Definite ufo sighting, repeatable/observable...

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around because their was nothing else to do and because it was nice out and i saw it a u.F.O  it  had landed in a sewage ditch by my house i ran toward it when i saw a old lady levitate off the ground in this really big and bright light and she went in to the ship.Then the ship hoverd for a few seconds and took off like a bullet.
content.summary: Big bright pretty

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house watching cars go by when i saw a light rise from the drainage sump diagonal from my residence. from my viewpoint it appeared to rise from the ground straight towards the sun. it was halfway up when it vanished. i thought it looked like a cobalt blue flare but it was moving too slow. i did not have any explanation for this sighting.
content.summary: Bright light above sump

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house watching cars go by when i saw a light rise from the drainage sump diagonal from my residence. from my viewpoint it appeared to rise from the ground straight towards the sun. it was halfway up when it vanished. i thought it looked like a cobalt blue flare but it was moving too slow. i did not have any explanation for this sighting.
content.summary: Bright light above sump

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:30 pm on 12-25-11 my son came running into the family room urging my wife and i to look out the back of our house which faces west.  we looked out and saw innumerable lights off in the distance moving from north to south along a relatively straight path.  we proceeded out onto the deck and continued to observe these lights.  as they moved to the south, they then appeared to head more west and appeared to climb and then disappear rather rapidly one by one.  as we looked to the north, more lights continued to appear.  this was a constant stream that we saw for at least 10 minutes, lights disappearing into the sky to the south and west and more lights appearing from the north.  i would estimate that several hundred of these objects passed by during this time all taking the same path before turning to the west and up into the sky and disappearing.  i had grabbed my cell phone on the way out to the deck and tried to record the objects but the quality is not great.  in fact, some of the objects which i could see with the naked eye did not appear on the camera screen while others did.  i am attaching the video clip.  there are some christmas lights from a few nearby houses along the bottom of the screen, not to be confused with the moving lights which appear much smaller.  we could not make out any sound from these objects.
content.summary: Innumerable lights moving north to south 10:30 pm 12-25-11 overland park ks area

content.detailedDescription:
On this day as mentioned, i as well as my wife saw this craft and it was not an aberration. we have a set of binoculars set up in our studio which has always been focused on breeding ospray. the set up is at the base of a set of stairs which lead down to a lower level art studio. when upstairs visiting,i would quickly peek at them as i entered or left her personal space.
this day,past the nest, i clearly saw this hovering object as high as an airplane.
i immediately notified my wife who in her amazement, watched this object.
now this is the peculiar issue....As she looked at it, and i stood by, i noticed it was completely invisible to the naked eye. completely. it should have been easily seen with the naked eye for i had low power binoculars. i would then peer into the binoculars to see it once again. it was obviously cloaked to the naked eye...Simply astonishing.

we watched it for around fifteen minutes just hovering in place, not moving but maybe slightly rotating. then poof, it vanished.

i went home and searched the internet and to my amazement, saw the identical craft someone else had actually photographed in the past.

it appeared to be three conical shapes connected together which looked like a megaphone set up with a semi-sphere attached below it

the object was bright silver.
content.summary: Dixie cups connected to one another with a sphere beneath it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from my boyfriends house and once i got to about two miles from my home i saw two lights in the sky, one was very much brighter than the other and appeared to be twinkling different colors.  at first i thought they  were venus and jupiter because the news said you would be able to see them in the night sky.  i kept my eye on them and about two minutes later i approached a stop sign in a very dark area. i stopped and grabbed my phone to take a picture, and i could clearly tell there was one object in the sky in front me.  the bright lights were off now, but i could see about 10 small white lights along the side of the object.  at the intersection, you can only turn left or right, and straight in front of you is a small grassy embankment with a few homes and farmland behind it.  i turned left toward home and kept driving because i was scared.  i got about 500 yards from the intersection still looking at the sky, when i saw an object moving very slowly above me, going toward the adjacent hillside.  it was a black triangle, with a small white light at each corner, and a small red light in the middle.  i kept my eye on it til it went over the hillside, only slightly above the trees. i got to my home within the next minute and sat out in my car for a few minutes in the dark.  no other objects were in the sky, and the night was rather overcast, so i couldn't even see the stars. 

when i came home i started researching ufo's and was pretty scared to see that these black triangles have been seen many times before.  the pittsburgh int'l airport and the 911th air wing are near me, so i am used to helicopters, planes, and large military cargo planes in the sky, but i have never seen anything like this.  also, my friends and i like to stargaze, and are familiar with other moving objects like meteors and satellites.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw two bright lights in distance, got closer, lights went out and could see side lights, black triangle flying over
